channel.title: Bye everyone
channel.description:
Well,not alot of you know me but i thought i'd announce me leaving,i have had a pretty hectic life on these forums.I will be mentioning all the people who i respect and who have helped me over the months,
flamed fury1:This is the person i respect the most on these forums,he tought me all i know before he came along i was so dumb i was asking the javac not recognised error, he took me under his wing theoreticly and tought me all.
bigmac: he tought me all i know about graphics before him i could use a magic wand tool. He tought me all to do with graphics and then the kind people of the graphics community built on the foundations
pookey71: me and him have been good friends,both quitting and well me and him have a understanding if that is the word that would suit the most.
fastballz:same as bigmac mostly except me and him dont talk much.He just helped me with my problems along the way, he wrote some tutorials that were custom made for me i think, every question i would ask he would answer or make a tut.
I've quit because ?
Moparscape is gettin too many leechers these days and no-one can make a source,tutorial with out someone leeching it, plus i have my gcse's to sort out,i have all my life to sort out i used to think why do all the people who i respect quiting becuase of leechers/or the same reason as me gcse. Well now i see it gets really frustrating.
i also thank mopar and all the mods, you have kept this wunderus site up and runing and also clean its by far the bet community i have been in and the kindest u will be sorely missed

item.title: Bye everyone
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:16, topic:18193”][quote author=james link=topic=27202.msg313399#msg313399 date=1160796924]
ok, make making a leaving thread result in a ban, then they cant lie.
[/quote]
yeah i think this is a good idea, ban the people who are leaving then they cannot come back meaning they cannot lie.[/quote]
haha, lol. I like it.

“Hey dudes i’ll be gone for like 1 day or so so omg like dont panic”
“Perm banned.”

Read full topic

item.title: Bye everyone
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

See ya later man, I don’t know you but thanks for being a part of the forums. Also yes there are alot of people “leaving” and whether they all are telling the truth or not doesn’t matter unless they don’t actually leave. Now if they were dumb enough to say that they were leaving and stay around everyone will hate them anyways which would probably cause them too leave anyways. So in the long run anyone who posts something like this, whether it maybe the truth or not, should still have our respect in saying good bye to them because like I said if they’re looking for attention this is sure the best way to not get any(atleast any positive) attention.

Read full topic

item.title: Bye everyone
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Fat Cobra:

get lost james, he is leaving show him a little respect…and also i have a feeling (dont know why) by you should have thanked all the mods for keeping moparisthebest clean and most defianatley thanked mopar for making such a great site…

Ok gonna have to disagree, i think threads that say im leaving shud be banned, if your going to leave, just leave… no one actually cares unless you are sum1 uberl33t who alot of people know… say pwnd but honestly these threads are annoying and useless…

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:9, topic:18193”][quote author=james link=topic=27202.msg311967#msg311967 date=1160753720]
are you fucking serious?

not another fucking thread
[/quote]
That’s what i thought.

How many people are leaving? Is RaW going around to peoples houses threatening them or something? Maybe he stabbed irf’s eye to make him blind, god knows.[/quote]
dont bad mouth irf, but thats still a pretty good explanation…

Read full topic
